info.title: Azure Database Migration Service Resource Provider

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlSyncTaskInput.description: Input for the task that migrates MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL for online migrations

targetConnectionInfo.description: Connection information for target Azure Database for MySQL

sourceServerResourceId.description: Optional resource Id of the source server if it is an azure instance

targetServerResourceId.description: Optional resource Id of the target server

optionalAgentSettings.description: Optional parameters for fine tuning the data transfer rate during migration

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlSyncTaskOutpu.description: Output for the task that migrates MySQL databases to Azure Database for MySQL for sync migrations

MigrateMySqlAzureDbForMySqlSyncDatabaseI.description: Database specific information for MySQL to Azure Database for MySQL migration task inputs

targetDatabaseName.description: Name of target database. Note: Target database will be truncated before starting migration.

tableMap.description: Mapping of source to target tables
